snippet: Jets Coach Todd Bowles said Smith, the team’s starting quarterback, was punched in the locker room by linebacker Ikemefuna Enemkpali. Smith will need surgery on a broken jaw.
abstract: New York Jets reserve linebacker Ikemefuna Enemkpali punches starting quarterback Geno Smith in face in locker room confrontation, breaking his jaw and adding to list of embarrassing incidents that have plagued team; Smith will miss six weeks of play; episode has deflated team's hopes, which have been on rise since management change in January.
lead_paragraph: Jets Coach Todd Bowles said Smith, the team’s starting quarterback, was punched in the locker room by linebacker Ikemefuna Enemkpali. Smith will need surgery on a broken jaw.

headline.main: Geno Smith Is Sucker-Punched in the Latest Bizarre Blow to the Jets
headline.print_headline: Latest Bizarre Blow to the Jets: A Quarterback Sucker-Punched
